name: The Confederacy
declaringWar: The Confederation from now on consider you an enemy.
attacked: Can't we find a mutually beneficial relationship?
defeated: The Confederation is now ended my dears, but His spirits will forever remains in our hearts.
introduction: Greetings, consider us rapresentatives of the Confederation
neutralHello: We always belive in intergovernmental relationships.

tradeRequest: Our Government is disposed to make an exchange...
